overview:
Mr. Larry Harris is the Senior Vice President & Chief Financial Officer of Sensis Corporation. He is responsible for all aspects of the company’s finance and accounting functions as well as investor relations. Mr. Harris has been in his current position since 1998 and formerly served as a business area manager for Sensis Corporation.

Prior to joining Sensis, Mr. Harris worked for 10 years at General Electric in a multitude of financial assignments, and three years at Syracuse China as director of financial operations. He received a BS from Cornell University and graduated from General Electric’s Financial Management Program.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President & Chief Financial Officer
